ORDER

casebody.head_matter:
557 A.2d 1063
Nan S. SMOLOW (appellant at no. 40) and Kim Verrichia (appellant at no. 49), individually and on behalf of all other persons similarly situated, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE and David L. Donahoe, Secretary of the Department of Revenue.

Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
